Hai Nguyen Van

Personal Homepage

About

  • I graduated from the Master Parisien de Recherche en Informatique at the Université Paris Diderot.
  • I have been working on malware research and software verification as an Intern at Commissariat à l’Énergie Atomique (LIST/LSL).
  • I am now a Doctoral Candidate in Formal Verification under the supervision of Pr Burkhart Wolff and Pr Frédéric Boulanger in the VALS LRI team at the Université Paris-Sud.
  • More specifically, I study a way to formalize the semantics of the synchronous heterogeneous specification language TESL into the proof assistant Isabelle/HOL.

Research

  • H. Nguyen Van. Unifying syntactic model-checking verification techniques. Commissariat à l’Énergie Atomique, Tech. Rep. 14-0197/HNV, 2014.
  • H. Nguyen Van. Advanced topics in malware camouflage and countermeasures. Commissariat à l’Énergie Atomique, Tech. Rep. 2013-0176/HNV, 2013.
  • H. Nguyen Van, S. Flih, I. Blanchard, B. Robert, L. Viens, M. Arnoux, P. Coïsson, O. Robert et al. French students build a ground station for Pratham satellite (abstract). 39th Committee on Space Research Scientific Assembly (COSPAR).

Duties

I am a co-organizer of the Doctoral Seminar Series at École Doctorale d’Informatique de Paris-Sud.

Teaching

  • L3 Informatique - Programmation fonctionnelle avancée (some assignments)
  • 4è année Ingénieur - Introduction à la compilation
